snippet: The South Korean government accused North Korea on Wednesday, of sending out jamming signals, forcing 252 commercial flights to switch off their GPS devices.
lead_paragraph: The South Korean government accused North Korea on Wednesday, of sending out jamming signals, forcing 252 commercial flights to switch off their GPS devices.

headline.seo: South Korea Accused North Accused of Jamming Signals
headline.main: South Korea: North Accused of Sending Jamming Signals to Disrupt GPS
headline.print_headline: South Korea: North Accused of Sending Jamming Signals to Disrupt GPS
